note:
A writer (amateur) of prose and poetry. A streamer (occasionally) of games. A software engineering person. According to some, Scottish Chewbacca.

I'm also a volunteer transcriber for the Grafeas Group, a 501(c)(3) non-profit dedicated to internet accessibility. Have a wee look if you're interested: https://grafeas.org/

fields.name: Website
fields.value: https://murdomaclachlan.github.io/website/

fields.name: Profile picture transcription
fields.value: An ovular vector eye with a circular iris and a 20-sided die for a pupil. The iris is red and the whites are sunset orange, while the outlines and die are white. The number on the die is 20.
